body:
Is ranked going to be introduced after the Atlas update? If so, please do it.


Have a good day, folks!

title: Is ranked going to be introduced?

replies.body: A similar rotation is planned to be added.
replies.body_tagged: A similar rotation is planned to be added.

replies.body: I certainly have plans to introduce it in the future, but after Atlas of course.
